title: Ep. 591 Socialism Sucks and People Who Believe in it Suck Too
description:
This is insane. Nearly half of Millennials approve of Socialism? Have they lost their minds? https://t.co/GT1apBvDDm   Socialism sucks. Here’s another example of the devastation it causes. https://t.co/hV8Wkg4hNJ   This very real threat that could wipe out 90% of Americans in the impact zone. http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/trump-warned-of-devastating-emp-attack/article/2640639   Read this piece about record tax revenues and you’ll realize how our debt problem is a spending issue, not a tax issue.  https://www.cnsnews.com/news/article/terence-p-jeffrey/feds-collected-record-taxes-october-still-run-63-billion-deficit   Lying Liberals are using the Kansas tax cuts as an example of why tax cuts won’t work. The problem is, they’re all wrong. http://www.foxnews.com/opinion/2017/10/29/dont-let-way-kansas-handled-tax-cuts-be-used-as-excuse-to-block-federal-cuts.html    
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
